name: Board
responsibilities: Display the grid of the board on the screen
Display the numbers and letters for each intersection on the screen
Store each of the pieces on the screen
Check if each move is legal before accepting a move

name: Piece
responsibilities: Store the position of the piece on the board
Store the colour of the piece
Display the representation of the piece on the screen

name: Colour
responsibilities: Store the colour of a piece on the screen
Store as an empy colour if the piece has not been placed yet

name: player_turn
responsibilities: Store who's turn it is supposed to be
collaborators: Main file that runs the game loop
